sqlMap.select: select BANKNODE_CODE, BANK_CODE, ND, BANKNODE_NAME, BANKNODE_NO, BANNODE_ADDR, POST_CODE, COMM_ADDR, URL, LINK_MAN, MOBI_TELE, LOCA_TELE, LOCA_FAX, IS_USED, BANK_ACCOUNT from MA_BANKNODE where BANKNODE_CODE = #banknodeCode:VARCHAR# and BANK_CODE = #bankCode:VARCHAR# and ND = #nd:DECIMAL#
sqlMap.delete: delete from MA_BANKNODE where BANKNODE_CODE = #banknodeCode:VARCHAR# and BANK_CODE = #bankCode:VARCHAR# and ND = #nd:DECIMAL#
sqlMap.insert: insert into MA_BANKNODE (BANKNODE_CODE, BANK_CODE, ND, BANKNODE_NAME, BANKNODE_NO, BANNODE_ADDR, POST_CODE, COMM_ADDR, URL, LINK_MAN, MOBI_TELE, LOCA_TELE, LOCA_FAX, IS_USED, BANK_ACCOUNT) values (#banknodeCode:VARCHAR#, #bankCode:VARCHAR#, #nd:DECIMAL#, #banknodeName:VARCHAR#, #banknodeNo:VARCHAR#, #bannodeAddr:VARCHAR#, #postCode:VARCHAR#, #commAddr:VARCHAR#, #url:VARCHAR#, #linkMan:VARCHAR#, #mobiTele:VARCHAR#, #locaTele:VARCHAR#, #locaFax:VARCHAR#, #isUsed:CHAR#, #bankAccount:VARCHAR#)
sqlMap.update: update MA_BANKNODE set BANKNODE_NAME = #banknodeName:VARCHAR#, BANKNODE_NO = #banknodeNo:VARCHAR#, BANNODE_ADDR = #bannodeAddr:VARCHAR#, POST_CODE = #postCode:VARCHAR#, COMM_ADDR = #commAddr:VARCHAR#, URL = #url:VARCHAR#, LINK_MAN = #linkMan:VARCHAR#, MOBI_TELE = #mobiTele:VARCHAR#, LOCA_TELE = #locaTele:VARCHAR#, LOCA_FAX = #locaFax:VARCHAR#, IS_USED = #isUsed:CHAR#, BANK_ACCOUNT = #bankAccount:VARCHAR# where BANKNODE_CODE = #banknodeCode:VARCHAR# and BANK_CODE = #bankCode:VARCHAR# and ND = #nd:DECIMAL#
sqlMap.select:
select * from MA_BANKNODE where ND=#nd:INTEGER#
